name: Rimuru the Slime
description: Rimuru Tempest (リムル゠テンペスト Rimuru Tenpesuto), or Rimuru the Slime, is the main protagonist of an anime titled "That Time I Got Reincarnated as a Slime". In their normal form, Rimuru takes the appearance of a spherical mass of slightly blue and translucent ooze. Rimuru can take a human form as the anime progresses and sometimes wears a mask (depicted top right) titular to their story. Rimuru is loved for their cute and innocent appearance, which contradicts their powerful magical abilities.
